ComicInfo.Summary:
Stephanie gets to interview one of the German Battleships in person, with surprising results while Sieglinde and Maria face off for Round 2 of the Battleship Battle!
Available with Regular, Wraparound, War Crimes, Propaganda, and Blitzkrieg by series artist Daniel Gete, and a limited VIP Premium cover by Gabriel Andrade.
